text: Answer: (d) Solution: When i2 mod 4 is evaluated the value comes out to be 0 and 1 for even and odd values of i respectively. Like when i = 0 hash function value comes to be 0 When i =1, hash function value comes to be 1. Thus two of the buckets will get approximately half-half entries while the other two will remain empty. Thus option d is correct.
